description: Non material minor amendment of planning permission reference P041872 dated 15 December 2006 for the Erection of 36 storey building and two eight storey buildings to provide 308 residential units up to 845 sq.m. of mixed use commercial (Use Class A1/A3/B1/D2), basement car parking for up to 78 cars and ancillary plant rooms.  The application also includes the creation of a new pedestrian/vehicular access from Graham Street and new open space accessible to the public. The amendments are: reconfiguration of the basement layout, alterations to the lift and stair cores; rationalization of the internal layouts; introduction of lift over run at roof level; reconfiguration of the layout at ground floor level; amalgamation of lightwells to improve lighting to bedrooms; and reorganisation of the internal layout.
decision_conditions:
The applicant is reminded that the scope of the proposed alterations agreed under this non material amendment application are strictly as summarised below:
 reconfiguration of the basement layout, alterations to the lift and stair cores; rationalization of the internal layouts; introduction of lift over run at roof level; reconfiguration of the layout at ground floor level; amalgamation of lightwells to improve lighting to bedrooms; and reorganisation of the internal layout.
